statements: SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_id = 'ABC123';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status, carrier_name FROM shipment_tracking WHERE estimated_delivery_date > '2021-10-01';
SELECT tracking_number, actual_delivery_date FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking ORDER BY estimated_delivery_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, carrier_name FROM shipment_tracking WHERE carrier_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status, estimated_delivery_date FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY estimated_delivery_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE actual_delivery_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT carrier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM shipment_tracking GROUP BY carrier_name ORDER BY total_shipments DESC
SELECT tracking_number FROM shipment_tracking WHERE carrier_name = 'UPS' AND estimated_delivery_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_status = 'Delivered'
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, origin_location, destination_location, status FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM shipments WHERE status='In Transit';
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tracking_info WHERE status='Delivered' ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, origin_location, destination_location FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT shipment_id, origin_location, destination_location, status FROM shipments WHERE destination_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, origin_location, destination_location, status FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.tracking_id, t.shipment_id, t.tracking_date, t.location, s.status AS shipment_status, t.status AS tracking_status FROM tracking_info t JOIN shipments s ON t.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE t.status = 'In Transit';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, current_status, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, destination_address FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, current_status FROM shipments WHERE current_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipments_history WHERE new_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1;
SELECT shipment_id, tracking_number, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE destination_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM shipments LEFT JOIN shipments_history ON shipments.shipment_id = shipments_history.shipment_id WHERE shipments.current_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT shipment_id, new_status, reason FROM shipments_history WHERE status_change_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, issue_date, issue_description FROM logistics_issues ORDER BY issue_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT shipment_date, estimated_delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT package_id, package_status, delivery_service_provider FROM packages ORDER BY package_status ASC;
SELECT location_name, address, city, country FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT package_id, package_weight, package_status FROM packages WHERE package_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY package_weight DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT tracking_id, shipment_id, package_id, location_id, status, last_updated FROM tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT tracking_number, sender_name, receiver_name FROM shipments WHERE status='In Transit';
SELECT shipment_id, tracking_number, delivery_address, status FROM shipments WHERE status='Delivered';
SELECT sender_name, receiver_name, delivery_address FROM shipments WHERE sender_name='John Doe' AND receiver_name='Alice Smith';
SELECT update_datetime, update_details, update_location FROM tracking_updates WHERE shipment_id=101 ORDER BY update_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT tracking_number, sender_name, receiver_name FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_address, status FROM shipments WHERE status LIKE '%In Transit%';
SELECT shipment_id, receiver_name, delivery_address FROM shipments WHERE receiver_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM tracking_updates WHERE update_datetime >= '2021-10-01' AND update_location = 'New York' ORDER BY update_datetime ASC;
